heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
guidesSubtitle: Our team is dedicated to providing a safe, respectful, and transformative experience. With years of experience and a deep connection to ancestral traditions, our guides will accompany you on your path to healing and self-discovery.
footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
registerSubtext: Fill in the details below to create your account.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details below.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the guide's profile.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our team is dedicated to providing a safe, respectful, and transformative experience. With years of experience and a deep connection to ancestral traditions, our guides will accompany you on your path to healing and self-discovery.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming and past events.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Please check back later.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your journey today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, traditionally used for healing and spiritual insight. It is a powerful tool for self-discovery, emotional cleansing, and connecting with a higher consciousness.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, emotional, and spiritual level. It can reveal deep-seated patterns, release emotional blockages, and offer profound insights into your life's purpose, helping you integrate mind, body, and spirit.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master teacher plant. It doesn't just produce visions; it communicates wisdom, guiding you through a process of deep introspection and healing, tailored to your personal journey.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain new perspectives on personal challenges and life patterns.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release trauma, fears, and negative emotions in a safe space.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Deepen your connection with yourself, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the experience in a collective setting, where the energy of the group enhances the healing journey for everyone involved. It's a powerful way to connect and feel supported.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and focused experience, private ceremonies offer personalized attention and guidance tailored specifically to your individual needs and intentions.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred brew of Ayahuasca, its history, and how it can facilitate deep healing and transformation.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will support and protect you throughout your ceremonial journey.
explorePreparationDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Find out how to prepare your mind, body, and spirit.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and stay connected. Follow us on our social networks for updates, inspiration, and to share your journey with like-minded souls.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the system.
allUsersDescription: A list of all users and their details.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Dear user, we have exciting news...
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's answers to the medical and intention questionnaire.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted their questionnaire answers yet.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, especially antidepressants (SSRIs, MAOIs), or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a personal or family history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)
questionnaireExperience: Have you participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony or similar experiences before?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you provide a phone number.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please check your new email address for a verification link.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm this change.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. This action can be reversed.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the Past Events section.
errorFinishingCeremony: Failed to mark ceremony as finished.
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp templates used to invite users to fill out the questionnaire.
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Sign in or create an account to access our preparation guides and begin your journey.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare your mind, body, and spirit for the ceremony.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'Yes'.
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to achieve or heal...
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the steps. You are now ready for the next phase of your journey. We will contact you soon with more details.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: Here are the answers you submitted for the questionnaire.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: A complete guide to preparing your body, mind, and spirit for a transformative experience.
preparationProcessDescription: From intention to integration, each step is crucial.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space for profound connection and vision.
experienceProcessDescription: Navigate your inner world with expert guidance.
integrationProcessDescription: Bring the wisdom of the ceremony into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: We purify the body to prepare a clean temple for the spirit. Start this diet at least 3 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables, whole grains (oats, rice, quinoa), legumes, lean chicken or fish (cooked simply), nuts and seeds, and drink plenty of water.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat, pork, fermented foods, aged cheeses, alcohol, caffeine, spicy foods, refined sugars, and excessive salt.
mentalPrepSubtitle: A calm mind and a clear intention are your best allies on this journey.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and cultivate presence.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you wish to heal, understand, or explore during the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes to gain clarity before the experience.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be an intense emotional journey. It's a process of purification that allows you to release what no longer serves you, from deep-seated fears to unresolved traumas. Approach it with an open heart, ready to receive the healing that the medicine has to offer you. Trust the process, your guides, and your own inner strength.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Come prepared to be comfortable and focused on your inner journey.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, loose-fitting clothing (preferably white or light-colored), a blanket or sleeping bag, a pillow or cushion, a bottle of water, a journal and pen for reflections.
essentialsList: A change of clothes for the next day, personal hygiene items, an open mind and heart, and your defined intention.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: To view our ceremonies, please sign in or create an account.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user should be assigned to.
noActiveCeremonies: There are no active ceremonies to assign.
myCeremoniesSubtitle: Here are the ceremonies you are registered for.
noAssignedCeremoniesDescription: You are not assigned to any ceremonies. Explore our events and contact us to join.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from the public list, but it will remain in the system. You can reactivate it later.
adminPanelSubtitle: Welcome to the control center for El Arte de Sanar.
exportDataDescription: Download all Firestore data as a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Import data from a JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importSuccessDescription: Data has been imported. A backup of the previous state has been created.
importWarningDescription: This action is destructive. It will overwrite all current data in the database with the data from the selected file. A backup of the current state will be created automatically.
rollbackCardDescription: A backup was created just before your last import. You can roll back to this state if the import caused issues.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to the state before the last import.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to restore the data to the state before the last import? This will overwrite the current data.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review conversations with the spiritual guide AI.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to view the full chat history.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
errorLogsSubtitle: Monitor system errors and their status.
systemLogsDescription: A list of all recorded errors in the application.
deleteLogConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this log entry?
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the recorded error.
themeCustomizationDescription: Customize the application's color scheme for light and dark modes.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
analyticsDescription: Track user interactions with different sections of the app.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click-tracking data. This action cannot be undone.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view, reserve, and WhatsApp click counters for this ceremony to zero.
